Class GraphDrawer

view.GraphDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
class GraphDrawer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Class used to draw the graphs

      Initializes the variables with the values sent
      Parameters:
      yCoords - Array with the values to display and the current hour at the end
      name - Name of the graph to be displayed
      lineColor - Color of the graph's main line

      private int numSections​(int x)
      Calculates the number of sections the graph should have
      Parameters:

      Returns:
